body.name: Dickies Women's Perfect Shape Denim Jean-Bootcut Stretch
features: Innovative comfort & style: this women's boot cut stretch denim jean is an essential go-to ideal for everyday wear. It features a flex tummy panel that helps reduce any possible muffin top and 46% stretch to help you hold shape while keeping you comfy.

Casual functionality: Dickies perfect shape jeans are designed with our innovative "S gene" Technology, delivering superior stretch and recovery. The soft, performance denim Will not stretch out and provides support that slims and contours your shape.

Quality & comfort: Our jeans are made with quality, comfort & value in mind. Our work wear products have distinctive designs with attention to detail on every garment, including easy care wrinkle resistant fabrics, roomy pockets & Sturdy zippers & buttons

Trusted name: The world's leading performance work wear brand, Dickies has been making quality work wear & apparel since 1922. All Dickies clothing offers superior craftsmanship & unmatched value to deliver classic style & long-lasting comfort Every day.
We make jeans, outerwear, work uniform, sports shirts, kids wear, hats, socks, underwear, boots, gloves, belts, eyewear, backpacks, bags & much more.
body.description: Dickies women's perfect shape jeans are designed with cone's s gene technology to deliver superior stretch and recovery. This soft, performance denim won't stretch out and it provides more support that slims and contours your shape, creating effortless style.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #191,722 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #1,191 in Women's Jeans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2018
reviews.reviewText: They fit good. Same as other Dickies jeans I’ve had. I wear a 6 in Levi’s but 4 in Dickies. The pockets are a little less deep then the other dickies bootcut jeans I have gotten, but still significantly deeper than most women’s jeans. I only buy Dickies jeans now because the front pockets are actually useable. The only thing is the belt loops are a little small. This might not be a problem with most belts, but mine is just big enough to make it hard to put through the loops. It fits, but’s it’s pretty tight. I got these in dark blue and lighter blue. I like that the dark blue doesn’t have a lot of fading like most jeans. They seem like good quality and will hopefully last a long time. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite jeans!!
reviews.reviewText: In the history of me (and I’m 60), I have never been able to buy jeans on line. I have a smaller waist and large butt and I need to try jeans on! Well not anymore. These jeans arrived and fit like they were made for me! It was shocking to me. Great fabric and overall feel… I already ordered a 2nd pair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'2" (157.28cm) and 158~ lbs (71.5kg)Ordered the black pair in the size 8, tag on jean says 8/29.Purchased these to wear to work, 10hr shift in fab & assembly.First Impressions: Stretch is good, thicker fabric kinda scratchy Legs actually look longer with the bootcut, does the curves justice. Solid shade of black. No back gap, might need belt.Fit : 4/5 Fit my legs and especially my thighs and butt (the biggest part of my body) comfortably but is a little looser one my waist/stomach. I could go down a full 2 inches on the waistline but nothing a belt won't help with. The waistline sits right at my bellybutton (35" (89cm) to the floor) and doesn't ride too far down when I bend or squat, I have full coverage.I don't know if going down a size would be the right move for me just because I want them to be comfortable while I'm working and if they're too snug will hamper my range of movement.Length : 4/5 They are a little long, would go with a petite size if possible, but they will be worn with boots so it's not an issue. If you don't mind the hems dragging a bit or some hemming work like me then you'll be fine. Work pants are ment to get dirty.Fabric : 3/5 Seems like a sturdy denim. A bit scratchy but that'll be fixed with an initial wash. They do have a little stretch so if you are in between sizes then you're safe to go on the lower end. Seams are solid and the fabric is thicker than regular fashion jeans. Haven't put it through a workday yet but they seem like they'll hold up.Pockets : 2/5 Better than most jeans but could be bigger. When it comes to pockets size matters. At 16cm deep, just barely over 6", there's room for improvement where there isn't for my phone, keys, wallet, chapstick, and work fob. Can't carry a purse around the warehouse, ya feel?Price : 1.5/5 I personally don't like spending more than $20-$25 on a pair of pants but I need something sturdy and that fits over my boots. I bought these on a 20% off sale for $40 instead of $50 which is the only reason I considered these. Honestly just feels like I'm paying for the brand and not the pants at this point.I did order a pair of Wranglers that were on sale for $30 (29% off $42) that'll be here in a day or two. Depending on how well that pair fits I may return the Dickies and get another pair of W's (or 2, for that price).All that being said, I have not actually worn these to work so if I decide to keep them and they hold up for a long while then maybe they're worth it. For a $50 pair of jeans they at least better last me 3-5 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable jeans ever
reviews.reviewText: I have several pairs of these jeans. They are the most comfortable jeans I've ever own (besides pajama jeans). But if you need pockets and belt loops these are the next best thing. Have nice stretch but hold their shape. Very durable. I wear them when I work outside as well as inside. Can't go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Longer than advertised
reviews.reviewText: These jeans were advertised to be 32 1/2 inches long. They were 33 1/2. So as not to drag on the floor without shoes, I had to hem them. Wasn’t expecting that.The zipper is very hard to work, it does not moved smoothly at all. I tried candle wax, but hasn’t helped much.The waist is too low. I an not high waisted, but these make me feel that my pants are always falling down. I will have to wear a belt with them, not happy about that. Unfortunately all jeans lately fit like that. You can’t find boot cut with a normal height waist. To get a regular waist you have to buy jeans that are narrow at the ankle, not what I wanted.The fabric is very nice, the stretch is very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit - but long legs
reviews.reviewText: I really like the fit of these and they don’t stretch out and get baggy after wearing them. The legs are pretty long though - I need to cuff them so they don’t drag under my heel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way too big
reviews.reviewText: These are way too big. I wear a size 4. Ordered a 0 cause I read reviews that say they run big. They are still wayyyyy to big. I would have to go down another two sizes to get them to fit. Unfortunately I needed them for work and they are the only ones I can find so I have to suffer with pants that I have to constantly pull up even with a belt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fit is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I love how these jeans fit my body shape! I am not overly curvy but I do have a bit of shape in the tummy, rear and thigh. I haven't had a pair of jeans fit me this well. I am so glad I found them and already bought two other pairs. Quality is great as well.

First time, I measure. Even watched a tutorial. They were enormous. Maybe my body is upside down? My job is insane, and I forgot to return them in time. Still need new pants. Next two sizes down were sold out, thought the next might work. Well, they fit, but they're so high waisted that I hate them. Also, colour not as depicted. So they'll probably get gifted out as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice jeans but not the color depicted on picture
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for grey jeans all over the Internet and thought i had finally found...Unfortunately the color is more black than grey. I took a size 14 and was too big for me and i usually squeeze in a size 16. There is a market for light grey jeans bootcut style and affordable but no one is catching on !!
